workshop.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things
workshop.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a meeting at which people try to improve their skills by discussing their experiences and doing practical exercises
workshop.translation[0].definitions[1].e: They held a number of music workshops and seminars.
workshop.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a fairly small room or building in which tools and machines are used for making or repairing things
workshop.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Many local crafts people produce their goods from small workshops in their homes.
workshop.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a meeting at which people discuss their experiences and do practical exercises, especially in order to find solutions to problems
workshop.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Staff attended a two-day training workshop on basic PR techniques.
